name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Python 3**, **FastAPI**, and **PostgreSQL** for building high-performance, scalable applications. Proficient in designing and developing APIs that facilitate seamless integration and communication within distributed systems. Experienced in leveraging **Google Cloud Platform** for deploying robust applications with a focus on **Google BigQuery**, **ScyllaDB**, and **Redis** for efficient data management. Skilled in implementing real-time data processing solutions using **RabbitMQ**, **Apache Kafka**, and **Google Pub/Sub**, enabling distributed architectures for enhanced performance.

Possess strong problem-solving abilities, effective team collaboration, and a deep understanding of monitoring and analysis tools to ensure optimal application performance. My background includes a solid foundation in process automation and optimization, as well as experience in developing machine learning pipelines. I have a proven track record of delivering secure applications adhering to compliance standards.
